Q1. The Sutherland Hodgeman works for the following cases :
( ) Convex Polygon with convex clip window ( ) Concave polygon with convex clip window ( ) Convex polygon with concave clip window ( ) a and b ( ) a and c ( ) All of the above
Q2. Will the output matter on the order in which we process the polygon?
( ) Yes ( ) No
Q3. Let m be the slope of the line joining clip polygon point Pi(x1, y1) and Pi+1(x2, y2). The intersection point of this line with the Left side of clip window is :
( ) x = xmin; y = (int)(y2 + ((xmin - x2)*m)); ( ) x = xmax; y = (int)(y2 + ((xmax - x2)*m)); ( ) x = x2; y = ymin; ( ) x = (int) (x2 + ((ymax - y2)/m)); y = ymax;
